page.title: 18A SCHOOLGIRL'S DAY
page.content: I am Rachael Hudson and I live in Billingborough,Lincolnshire. I have a variety of pets. I get up at 8a.m. on school days. We are not allowed into school before 8.45a.m. so I set off at 8.40. I usually meet my friend Rachel Wesley and walk to school with her. When we get there we play skipping with our friends. Before morning break we have a choice of work.I usually write stories. At break I play football and then we work until lunch time. After lunch I play football again. In the afternoon we do a variety of work including art and computers. Computers are boring! At 3.30p.m. we go home. At the Primary School I can wear the clothes I like but when I go to the High School in September I shall have to wear a uniform.
